description: The party leader is addressing delegates at the event in Inverness.
title: Alex Cole-Hamilton speaks at Scottish Lib Dem conference
title_page: Alex Cole-Hamilton speaks at Scottish Lib Dem conference - BBC News
maintext:
Cole-Hamilton to address conference
Welcome to our coverage of Alex Cole-Hamilton's speech at the Scottish Lib Dem conference.
The party's leader is due to speak shortly before 15:00 at the event in Inverness.
You can watch his speech by pressing WATCH LIVE at the top of this page.
